scripts.publish: cd ../../gallery && npm i && npm run publish

artwork.title: Please Dune Come Alive
artwork.description: An aesthetic environment meant to mimic an endless and everlasting desert sunset from which over time an unusually mesmerizing, shapeshifting, and almost life-like spherical blob of sand particles has come into being. The artwork draws the viewer's attention to examine the blob and feel both pleased and puzzled...
artwork.tags: threejs, webgl, shaders, sphere, desert, sunset
